BridgeSection.Built on top of: is built on top of the cross-chain infrastructure enabling users to seamlessly transfer assets across all blockchains. The Bridge has become the most widely-used method to move assets cross-chain, offering low cost, fast, and secure bridging.
BridgeSection.Swap native assets: Swap native assets using our cross-chain AMM liquidity pools
BridgeSection.Access: Access over 16 different EVM and non-EVM blockchains with more integrations coming soon
BridgeSection.Integrate: Easily integrate cross-chain token bridging natively into your decentralized application

ExplorerSection.Synapse has processed: Synapse has processed millions of transactions and tens of billions in bridged assets.

HeroSection.title: Secure cross-chain communication
HeroSection.description: Synapse is the most widely used, extensible, secure cross-chain communications network. Build truly cross-chain applications using the Synapse Protocol.

HowItWorksSection.description: Smart contracts from one chain use the Synapse Messaging Router to send the message to the destination chain, where a corresponding Messaging Router sends it to the destination contract. Messages are optimistically verified to ensure security and trustlessness.

IntegrationSection.Synapse is: Synapse is widely integrated across the most-used Layer 1 and Layer 2 networks for a seamless cross-chain experience.

ResourcesSection.Find the resources: Find the resources you need to create integrations with Synapse.
ResourcesSection.Read detailed: Read a detailed breakdown of our APIs and smart contracts
ResourcesSection.Watch tutorials: Watch interactive tutorials to learn how Synapse works

UseCasesSection.title: Use cases
UseCasesSection.subtitle: Here's a preview of what you can do using Synapse.

useCases.title: Cross-chain exchange
useCases.description: Swap any asset on any blockchain using Synapse token swaps

useCases.title: Universal money markets
useCases.description: Borrow and lend assets across any blockchain using Synapse pools

useCases.title: Multi-chain gaming
useCases.description: Create unique gaming experiences that access multiple blockchains

SecuritySection.title: Securely connect every blockchain

description.part3: to reach consensus on the validity of cross-chain transactions, enabling developers to build truly native cross-chain apps.

SecuritySection.extensibleDescription: Synapse's cross-chain messaging contracts can be deployed across any blockchain
SecuritySection.secureDescription: Synapse employs an Optimistic security model to ensure integrity of cross-chain messages
SecuritySection.generalizedDescription: Any arbitrary data can be sent across chains including contract calls, NFTs, snapshots, and more

Pools.Contributors are rewarded: Contributors are rewarded for balancing asset pools.
Pools.Pools migrated to new reward contracts: Pools migrated to new reward contracts.
